title: Arctic ops zed
body: Riot should make a new arctic ops zed skin where his shadows were holograms. It would be the coolest skin ever. I think I found a concept art of it somewhere, but I can't find it. Rito pls.

replies.body: i would save holograms for a more futuristic zed skin. Arctic ops could use shadows still but focus moreo n his attacks for the changes
Then arctic ops shen and arctic ops akali
yes pls make this happen rito
